snippet: A convoy carrying members of the Shiite militant group Hezbollah was hit by a roadside bomb near Syria’s border, killing one and wounding two, officials said.
lead_paragraph: A convoy carrying members of the Shiite militant group Hezbollah was hit by a roadside bomb near Syria’s border, killing one and wounding two, officials said.

headline.main: Lebanon: Bomb Strikes Hezbollah Convoy Near Syria
